actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation, H. Rept. 94-1696.

official_title: A bill to designate the new Poe lock on the Saint Marys River at Sault Sainte Marie, Mich., as the John A. Blatnik lock.

summary.text: Designates the new Poe lock on the Saint Marys River at Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, as the "John A. Blatnik lock".

titles.title: A bill to designate the new Poe lock on the Saint Marys River at Sault Sainte Marie, Mich., as the John A. Blatnik lock.
